scripts.deploy:docker: yarn prepare:docker && npx graph deploy venusprotocol/etherfi-promo --ipfs http://ipfs:5001 --node http://graph-node:8020/ --version-label ci
scripts.deploy:sepolia: yarn prepare:sepolia && graph deploy venusprotocol/etherfi-promo-sepolia --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:ethereum: yarn prepare:ethereum && graph deploy venusprotocol/etherfi-promo --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
